name: Krystal Casey
what_you_do: Krystal Casey is a Systems Strategist, Speaker, and Business Integrator who helps overwhelmed entrepreneurs simplify and scale their businesses without the need for a full team.
who_you_serve: She serves creative entrepreneurs and wellness professionals looking to organize and operate their businesses more effectively.
current_projects: Currently booking for speaking engagements in 2025-2026, including sessions on automation and business scaling.
bio: 11 years of experience, speaker at various conferences including SheIsMe Global and Pathways to Paydays.
business_focus: Krystal Casey is a Systems Strategist, Speaker, and Business Integrator who helps overwhelmed entrepreneurs simplify and scale their businesses without the need for a full team. (business integration)
